channel.title: how many candys to sugar rush
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "how many candys to sugar rush"

item.title: Re: how many candys to sugar rush
item.content:encoded: If you don't have any Halloween items, then the first time you do 401 sugary candies you are guaranteed to get one. After that, the rush level is random from 1-1000, giving you a 40% chance if you do another max sugar rush.

item.title: how many candys to sugar rush
item.content:encoded: i tried a few times to get a high enough rush but i haven't so far. is there like a magic number or way to do it
